news_title: CFTC Launches Digital Assets Pilot Program Allowing Bitcoin and Ethereum as Derivatives Collateral
news_subtitle: CFTC launches pilot program allowing Bitcoin, Ethereum, and USDC as derivatives collateral in US markets. Weekly reporting required for participating firms starting December 2025.
